segments.text: Excuse me , here is my claim tag , but I can't find my baggage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many pieces of baggage have you lost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me the features of your baggage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a big leather suitcase with my name ' Lily ' on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . We will look it for you right now .
segments.speaker: S2
